name: Jousting Time!
description: Jousting Time! is a game inspired by Williams arcade classic Joust™, and the result of my first "make a complete game in one week" game jam. The only controls are right/left arrow keys and spacebar to flap (or you can use a controller). The goal is to get rid of the 11 evil Nazgeese by getting your pink flying ostrich  higher whenever you collide with them.
